p: Ursolic acid (UA) is a natural terpene that has been isolated from a variety of plant species and has demonstrated a wide variety of interesting biological activities. Although it has no cytotoxic effect itself, UA has been considered as a chemopreventive agent that modulates cellular response for cancer prevention, having anti-inflamatory and anti-oxidative properties and also an ability to modulate processes occurring inside a tumor, leading to cell death [ 37].
